name: lighted-repair-turret
title: Lighted Repair Turret
author: Johnson1893
description:
Crossover between Lighted Electric Poles Plus and Repair Turret mods!
Now we can produce repair turret with integrated lamp and large electric pole!

!!!WIP: at this moment new turrets wil not repair or build enything, but they still conduct Repair Turret's beam.!!!
